content.en: Crack detection algorithms: Researchers have been exploring the use of various algorithms to detect cracks in structures. These algorithms, such as Pareto-based Continuous Evolutionary Algorithms, Genetic Algorithms, Particle Swarm Approach, Bees Algorithm, Micro Genetic Algorithm, Hybrid Genetic Algorithms and Particle Swarm Optimization, and Metaheuristic-based Optimization, are being tested to accurately identify the location and depth of cracks in beam-like structures. The goal is to develop effective methods for diagnosing and characterizing structural damages in order to ensure the safety and integrity of these structures.
content.da: Revneudviklingsalgoritmer: Forskere har undersøgt brugen af forskellige algoritmer til at detektere revner i strukturer. Disse algoritmer, såsom Pareto-baserede kontinuerlige evolutionære algoritmer, genetiske algoritmer, partikelsværm-tilgang, bi-algoritme, mikro-genetisk algoritme, hybride genetiske algoritmer og partikelsværmoptimering, og metaheuristikbaseret optimering, bliver testet for nøjagtigt at identificere placeringen og dybden af revner i bjælkelignende strukturer. Målet er at udvikle effektive metoder til diagnosticering og karakterisering af strukturelle skader for at sikre sikkerheden og integriteten af disse strukturer.
